mapper.select: SELECT sy.subject_id, s.name, s.sub_year, s.semester, s.grades, s.type, s.sub_day, s.start_time, s.end_time, s.room_id, c.name college_name, p.name as professor_name, d.name as dept_name, p.tel, p.email, sy.overview, sy.objective, sy.textbook, sy.program FROM cu_subject AS s LEFT JOIN cu_professor AS p ON s.professor_id = p.id LEFT JOIN cu_department AS d ON p.dept_id = d.id LEFT JOIN cu_syllabus AS sy ON s.id = sy.subject_id LEFT JOIN cu_room AS r ON s.room_id = r.id LEFT JOIN cu_college AS c ON r.college_id = c.id WHERE subject_id = #{subjectId}
